name: MHTOCSMMProcedureBloodTransfusion
title: MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Procedure Blood Transfusion
description: The MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Procedure Blood Profile is derived from the MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Procedure Profile. This derived profile specifies an individual SMM indicator code by binding to an extension, ValueSet, and CodeSystem. /n There are 64 ICD-10 values identified for Blood Transfusion in this profile: 30230H0, 30230K0, 30230L0, 30230M0, 30230N0, 30230P0, 30230R0, 30230T0, 30230H1, 30230K1, 30230L1, 30230M1, 30230N1, 30230P1, 30230R1, 30230T1, 30233H0, 30233K0, 30233L0, 30233M0, 30233N0, 30233P0, 30233R0, 30233T0, 30233H1, 30233K1, 30233L1, 30233M1, 30233N1, 30233P1, 30233R1, 30233T1, 30240H0, 30240K0, 30240L0, 30240M0, 30240N0, 30240P0, 30240R0, 30240T0, 30240H1, 30240K1, 30240L1, 30240M1, 30240N1, 30240P1, 30240R1, 30240T1, 30243H0, 30243K0, 30243L0, 30243M0, 30243N0, 30243P0, 30243R0, 30243T0, 30243H1, 30243K1, 30243L1, 30243M1, 30243N1, 30243P1, 30243R1, 30243T1
